#### Description
Alkaline phosphatase, placental type ([ALPP](https://www.uniprot.org/uniprot/P05187)) is targeted in clinical trials ([NCT04627740](https://www.clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT04627740)) as treatment for ovarian cancer and endometrial cancer.
